features: 100% NATURAL COTTON – Our Tampons are made from GMO-free 100% Natural Cotton and are 100% hypoallergenic, dermatologically and Gynaecologically tested.

FUNCTIONAL AND COMFORTABLE - Customers have reported less discomfort and shorter periods when using Veeda products. Veeda tampons absorb faster than synthetic tampons and are designed and manufactured with comfort in mind.

REDUCES RISK OF TOXIC SHOCK SYNDROME - Oxygen cleansing creates a chlorine and pesticide FREE product, ensuring only 100% natural cotton touches your body. Veeda applicator tampons feature a BPA-Free plastic applicator and are healthy, safe, effective and irritation free.
DERMATOLOGICALLY TESTED – Veeda tampons are hypoallergenic and dermatologically tested. Our tampons are pesticide, dioxin, chemical, chlorine, dye, fragrance and synthetic FREE.

COMBATING PERIOD POVERTY – Veeda believes in a world where everyone has access to menstrual products and resources to uphold their health and dignity that we deserve. Veeda has donated globally over 4 MILLION feminine hygiene products and counting through our IRS registered charity.
body.description: Veeda Applicator Tampons are made with ultra-absorbent all-natural 100% cotton for reliable, leak-proof protection. Veeda natural tampons keep your clothes safe so that you can have a worry-free period! Designed with specialized grooves for added absorption and all-natural cotton string for easy removal. Highly effective, discreet and comfortable, Veeda Tampons are individually wrapped and sized just right for easy carrying. MANUFACTURED IN EUROPE - In ISO 4001 Compliant facilities. Veeda tampons are made with naturally soft, absorbent 100% pure GMO-Free cotton (that’s it, nothing else!) ensuring that your body only meets with the purest, irritation free ingredients. Our 100% natural cotton is sourced directly from a global network of leading cotton traders and all cotton is cleansed with an oxygen cleansing process, not chlorine-bleached, for a healthier, friendlier product. This process removes all dirt and impurities including any synthetic matter and this is the exact same process by which all organic cotton is cleansed with, to ensure it also has no synthetic substances. This ensures that the final tampons are truly 100% natural cotton. Veeda tampons are lab-tested for over 250 harmful chemicals and contain no wood or synthetic fibres, no additives and no dioxins.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ABOUT VEEDA We created Veeda because you and your body deserve the best. No harsh chemicals here — just natural goodness that always goes with the flow (literally).

Better for You No chemicals. No synthetics. No fragrances. Our tampons re made with a non-GMO natural cotton designed for comfort and protection. Better for the Planet Our tampons are packaged using recyclable materials. Veeda is committed to sustainably sourced ingredients and safe manufacturing processes. Better for All We’re working to end period poverty once and for all. Every time you buy a Veeda product, you help us deliver period care essentials to those who need them the most.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No leaks and super comfortable
reviews.reviewText: The applicator is easy to use and most of all no leaks! I was having the hardest time with mainstream tampons leaking and being uncomfortable for me. This product gave me 0 issues and I will only be using them from now on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A must for the girls
reviews.reviewText: Honestly I don’t get that visitor anymore but I keep these in my purse just incase and for those around me! I highly recommend and from those who I’ve spoke to this is a go to for them aswell

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy them! PMDD must have
reviews.reviewText: Freakin' LOVE these! I'd used cups before and obviously I had been using nonorganic brands of tampons for years, and this was my first organic brand. Night and day between the two. Organic really does decrease cramping (huge for me because I have PMDD) and SO comfortable without the bleach and other chemicals you're going to find in regular brands. Absorbent as heck, too! Great value for the price. I even bought the pads for my daughter and she loves them and agrees that organic really is important for lessened menstrual discomfort.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2022
reviews.reviewText: same shape/look as tampax tampons. wish they had multipacks with different absorbancies, as the regular doesn't hold a ton. but they work well!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Will purchase again
reviews.reviewText: I like that they are so comfortable that I can hardly feel them as I am a petite person. They are very affordable as j was looking for a quick fast delivery as I was unable to make it to the store at the time of getting my period. They arrived the next day as I had ran out of my normal organic tampons.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Next best thing to kotex security tampons
reviews.reviewText: If you miss kotex security tampons as much as I do then this is close as you are going to get especially the applicator, your welcome

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s a tampon
reviews.reviewText: What can I say. It’s a tampon. It soaks up what it needs to and doesn’t pollute your insides while doing it.Cups don’t work for me so I’m stuck with these things til menopause takes over. I like that they expand out instead of up and down like other brands. As such these don’t leak! I’m a repeat customer for life… or the life of my menstrual cycle at least.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars MAJORLY FLAWED PRODUCT!!
reviews.reviewText: These would be a great gift for your worst enemy. Basically joke tampons. Nothing about them works. I can't believe all the good reviews are legit. First off, the individual tampon wrappers are IMPOSSIBLE to open, i can barely tear it or pull it open, you really need scissors to open each tampon, it's ridiculous (and super fun around 3am when you're half asleep and trying to change your tampon) and next, once you're properly frustrated from opening the stupid thing, here comes the applicator....um... whyyy is there even an applicator?? It's pushes the tampon up 1/2 an inch and the tampon stays STUCK in the applicator!! Then you have to grab the end of the tampon (not ideal if you didn't wash your hands right before) and then tug and yank the tampon OUT of the worthless plastic applicator, just to have to manually insert it (and it's a weirdly long skinny shape that never feels comfortable once its in).Like, are these joke tampons? Are they counterfeit made by some fake company trying to rip off a real brand? I don't understand how these even made it past the test phase! I even read the box, I thought I had to be missing something--why is there even an applicator if it doesn't actually insert the tampon??! Will obviously never repurchase. Literally did NO ONE, test these out? Am I missing something?? These are ridic and should be illegal for the level of aggravation they cause.

I've been using the Diva cup for about a year but decided to try organic tampons. These are AMAZING. Regular tampons cause extreme discomfort and irritation for me. They're even painful to insert. I can't even tell I'm wearing these Veeda ones! So pleased they are free of chemicals and bleach. No wonder the regular tampons cause such problems.
ma fille est ravie, correspond parfaitement a la description.

I personally get yeast infections the second my period starts. I struggle with wearing pads or tampons as it is so uncomfortable down their. I tried veeda cotton tampons and night pads for 3 periods now. I’m beyond happy with them. I have never had something so comfortable. I can finally get my period and not worry about rashes and pain from the pads or tampons I use. Would highly recommend this product.

I like the tampons themselves, but the applicators are compact so you have to pop them into place when you're ready to use them, multiple times I had to throw them out because I pulled too hard to pop it into place and ended up pulling the tampon right out.. would like to see a full size version that doesn't have to be clicked into place

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on March 31, 2020
reviews.reviewText: These are a really good product, super absorbent and feel really comfortable. Kind to the body at a time when you’re so uncomfortable. Totally recommend this product.
